nodes.Description:
Pink tie dye print lehenga

Blouse - full front threadwork, real mirror and sequin embroidery on tie dye print base

Back - tie dye print with pink thread tassels.

Tie dye print fabric sleeve material provided.

Skirt with can-can, side zip, hook & tie.

Tie dye print soft chiffon material with silver thread detailing.

Baby pink dupatta with all over gold buttis and tie dye material tassels.

Bust size 40 (UK 10-12).

To get the most accurate fit, it is best to measure your bust size in inches (all around at the fullest section).

For any questions about measurements please see our size chart

https://www.shernilondon.com/sizeguide
nodes.Name: Pink Tie Dye Lehenga 10-12 (bust 40")

nodes.Description:
Mehndi Green Lehenga

Fully embroidered blouse front with real mirror, stone, cutdana and threadwork.

Plain green back blouse with gold tassels.

Bandhani print lehenga with sequin detailing all over.

Can-can, side zip, hook & ties.

Attachable plain green sleeves.

Net dupatta with gold borders.

Bust size 40 (UK 10-12).

To get the most accurate fit, it is best to measure your bust size in inches (all around at the fullest section). This piece comes with cups inside the blouse.

There is margin of 1 inch to open the bust area by your tailor.

For any questions about measurements please see our size chart

https://www.shernilondon.com/sizeguide
nodes.Name: Mehndi Green Lehenga 10-12 (bust 40")

nodes.Description:
Pink chiffon wave print lehenga with hand embroidered blouse detailing.

Blouse length - 15"

Cups

Attachable sleeves.

Print back and front.

Can-can (netting is at the bottom of the skirt)

This is a bust size 44"

Please ensure you measure yourself correctly as this will ensure you get the right fit.

For your bust size, measure your bust all around in inches at the fullest part. Allow an inch for ease within the outfit.

You can order a larger size and have it adjusted by your tailor.

If you need any help, get in touch with us using the contact form on the website.

nodes.Name: Blue Floral Lehenga 8 - 10 (bust 38")

nodes.Description:
Lilac blouse and ombre skirt with can-can

Attachable sleeves

Soft net dupatta

Mirror and threadwork design front and back

Ombre colour - light to dark lilac

Bust size 46"

UK 16-18

Please measure your bust so you get the most accurate fit.

For any questions about measurements or how to measure your bust please see our size chart

https://www.shernilondon.com/sizeguide
nodes.Name: Ombre Thread & Mirror Work Lehenga 16-18 (bust 46")

nodes.Description:
Sleeves provided separately 

 

*Please take extra care when selecting your size. Bust measurements are more accurate than UK dress sizing. Bust should be measured at the fullest part, in inches, allowing some room for movement within the garment. If you are unsure of how to measure, please use the 'Contact us' form on the website to get in touch and we will help you.*

 

Colour may vary slightly from photos due to editing
nodes.Name: Bandhani Lehenga with Mirror Work Blouse - 10-12 (bust 40")

Heavily embroidered yellow, cream and pink thread work blouse with cups and an open back design.

Embroidery around back blouse cut out.

Sleeve material provided.

Soft net dupatta with matching chevron border and tassels.

Bust size 42"

UK 12-14

For any questions about measurements or how to measure your bust please see our size chart

Small light gold border on peplum.

Lehenga with side zip and hook.

Gold thread and sequin work border with sequin design buttis all over.

Can-can with full lining.

Soft net dupatta with gold disc border detailing and blue border.

Bust 40"

Please ensure you double check the size, bust size is the best way to get an accurate fit.
